ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] running speed
ygData.msgSnippet: haha man, you took that persoanlly didnt you? for those who have a slow machine to really wanna wonder about running speeds, get your clarity, go to a shaman,
ygData.messageBody:
haha man, you took that persoanlly didnt you?
for those who have a slow machine to really wanna wonder about running
speeds, get your clarity, go to a shaman, and say
"clarity for sow" it seems to work every time, and then you dont have to
worry bout your machines speed.

geeze, if you cant admit that dicussing computer stats in relation to
running speed is a dumb thread, then you really out to examine your 2 cents
worth.

lets discuss casting time in relation to computer speed and particle density
on "off", "low", Med", and "high"
yea, that about the dumbness of this thread.




----- Original Message -----
From: Shawn Alley <shawna@...>
To: <eqenchanters@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 22, 2000 12:31 PM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] running speed


> If this is your 2 cents why don't you keep it to yourself?
> hm, let's see if any of the other threads going right now meet your lofty
> standard for "not stupid"...
> oh that's right there aren't any. how bout you stop the trolling and post
> something useful or keep your insulting comments to yourself.
>
> Now back to the stupid thread:
> I agree that computer speed/ram makes a big difference more than stats in
> the game for running speed. I have two machines split off one cable modem
> connection and the slower machine is always slower running. So, I don't
> think you guys are weird hehe; I think you tested perfectly trying your
> characters out on different machines.
>
